_instructions.profileImage: Your professional headshot or profile picture
_instructions.displaySize: Will be displayed as a 200px circle in the hero section
_instructions.maxFileSize: 150KB for optimal clarity and page load speed
_instructions.formats: JPG (recommended), PNG (for transparent backgrounds), or WebP
tips: Use a high-quality, well-lit professional photo
Center your face in the frame
GIF animations are supported but keep file size under 500KB
_instructions.optimization: Compress images using tools like TinyPNG, Squoosh, or ImageOptim
_instructions.placement: Place image file in /images folder and set filename here (e.g., 'profile.jpg')
